entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers at times heavy or flurries beginning early this afternoon then changing to flurries late this afternoon and ending this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
